entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Oxford House

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
